ygData.subject: Re: Level 30,35,40,45, and a "power level" comme
ygData.msgSnippet: Those were the days, eh?  All these white-collar roleplayers don t understand jack, O no, not like we did in those days!  You understand roleplaying when you
ygData.messageBody:
Those were the days, eh? All these white-collar "roleplayers" don't
understand jack, O no, not like we did in those days! You understand
roleplaying when you have your elbows and knees coated in shit and piss.
Mostly we stuck with tabletop though, hehehe.

Roop



>From: "Michael Steele" <wvrk_jock@...>
>
>Dwarf in the sewers? By the blood of Greyhawk! Was that you I saw with
that
>pack of wererats following you?
>Been RP'ing for 17 years. Ewwww. Am I geeked up or what? Been playing since
>the *Chainmail* days. For those of you who don't know what Chainmail is,
its
>those little light brown paper backs Gary Gygax (curse him) made pre-D&D
>boxed sets.
>
>Aci
